text: Absolutely thrilled with Global Art at the Punggol Plaza branch! My 5-year-old daughter has been attending their crayon painting and pencil sketching classes, and she absolutely loves it. The instructors are incredibly nurturing and skilled. The classes are engaging and age-appropriate, helping my daughter develop her artistic skills while having fun. I highly recommend Global Art for anyone looking to inspire their child's love for art. It‚Äôs been a fantastic experience!

Today is my younger son's art competition at MBS. We have been with global art since my elder boy was 6 yo and now he's 11yo. It's been 5 years and our boys like the teachers and enjoyed the exposure via the competitions big and small.

My son has started art lesson 1 year ago at Bukit Batok branch, as he was very interested in art and drawing. In Global Art he had learnt a lot of drawing, painting, different techniques of art.  Art lessons are very creative, fun and engaging.   He thoroughly enjoys the class.
